statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

header.gameNote: LITTLE CAESARS HORIZON LEAGUE MEN'S CHAMPIONSHIP - 2ND ROUND

article.description: JT Yoho scored 20 points, Michael Karena added 19 and Wright State rolled to a 82-72 victory over Detroit on Sunday in a Horizon League tournament quarterfinal.
article.headline: Wright State beats Detroit 82-72 in Horizon quarterfinal
article.linkText: Wright State beats Detroit 82-72 in Horizon quarterfinal
article.story: DETROIT -- JT Yoho scored 20 points, Michael Karena added 19 and Wright State rolled to a 82-72 victory over Detroit on Sunday in a Horizon League tournament quarterfinal. The third-seeded Raiders (21-12) have won five straight, and play second-seeded Oakland in Monday's semifinal. Mark Alstork had 17 points and Joe Thomasson chipped in 12 for Wright State. Paris Bass scored 24 points and grabbed 13 rebounds to lead No. 6 seed Detroit (16-15). Carlton Brundidge added 18 points. The Raiders took the lead for good three minutes into the game, and led 37-29 at the break. Yoho made a 3-pointer to stretch Wright State's lead to 54-37 with 14:44 to play. Detroit pulled within nine points twice in the second half but did not get closer. The Titans outrebounded Wright State 39-27 but committed 17 turnovers and shot 0 of 11 from 3-point range.
